item.title: Hurry-up for the VCP5-DCV Delta Exam
item.description: VMware has released a new delta exam to re-certify current VCP5-DCV holders. This delta exam focusses on material between vSphere 5.0/5.1 and vSphere 5.5 exams. This exam must be done before the end of the month! Here are some details of the exam: Based on new material between the vSphere 5.
